movies.title: Dance with the Jackals 2
movies.plot: After the jackals have a hard time adjusting to life in jail, they sign up to take drugs that prevent people from committing crimes, but they miss their old ways.
movies.simplePlot: After the jackals have a hard time adjusting to life in jail, they sign up to take drugs that prevent people from committing crimes, but they miss their old ways.

biography.bio: Sevket Çoruh was born in Istanbul in 1973 and graduated from the Drama Department of the Müjdat Gezen College of Fine Arts. He began acting for the stage in 1989, since when he has performed in several productions. A newcomer to cinema, his screen debut came in 2003, when he starred as one of the leads in Ömer Vargi's Insaat (Under Construction) and scooped several Best Actor awards for his performance. Since 1998, he has also been acting for television.
biography.name: Sevket Çoruh

biography.bio: Ilker Ayrik was born on October 16, 1979 in Balikesir, Turkey. He is an actor and director, known for Çakallarla Dans (2010), Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012) and The Last Ottoman: Knockout Ali (2007).
biography.name: Ilker Ayrik

biography.bio: Timur Acar was born in 1979 in Adapazari, Sakarya, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Love in Another Language (2009), Çakallarla Dans (2010) and Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012).
biography.name: Timur Acar

biography.bio: Murat Akkoyunlu is an actor, known for Çakallarla Dans (2010), Sag Salim (2012) and 2 süper film birden (2006).
biography.name: Murat Akkoyunlu

biography.bio: Didem Balçin was born on May 18, 1982 in Ankara, Turkey. She is an actress, known for Dirilis: Ertugrul (2014), Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012) and Full of Hunger (2012).
biography.name: Didem Balçin

biography.bio: Hakan Bilgin is an actor, known for The Bandit (1996), Keloglan vs. the Black Prince (2006) and Adam and the Devil (2007).
biography.name: Hakan Bilgin

biography.bio: Doga Rutkay was born on October 30, 1978 in Ankara, Turkey. She is an actress, known for Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012), Pak Panter (2010) and There Is Another Possibility (2007).
biography.name: Doga Rutkay

biography.bio: Ceyhun Yilmaz was born on October 5, 1976 in Istanbul, Turkey. He is an actor, known for The Chaos Class in the Military (2005), Çakallarla Dans (2010) and Maskeli Besler: Intikam Pesinde (2005).
biography.name: Ceyhun Yilmaz

biography.bio: Born in 1980. Studied Theater at Davidson College, NC. Moved to Dublin upon graduation where he lived until 2008. Continued his training at the Gaeity School of Acting and Irish Film Academy. Started his professional acting career in Ireland's popular prime-time soap opera "Fair City". Upon his return to Turkey in 2009, shared the lead with Tuba Büyüküstün in his first cinema film - "Ask Your Heart" - directed by Yusuf Kurçenli. Acted in numerous hit dramas and comedies on Turkish TV.
biography.name: Kenan Ece

biography.bio: Altan Gördüm was born on December 1, 1958 in Adana, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Ask geliyorum demez (2009), Joypad (2016) and Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012). He is married to Vahide Perçin.
biography.name: Altan Gördüm

biography.bio: Mehmet Ali Kaptanlar is an actor, known for My Grandfather's People (2011), Rapunzel (2010) and Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012).
biography.name: Mehmet Ali Kaptanlar

biography.bio: Bülent Sakrak was born on August 26, 1977 in Istanbul, Turkey. He is an actor, known for 5 Dakkada Degisir Bütün Isler (2016), Son Mektup (2015) and Muro: Nalet Olsun Içimdeki Insan Sevgisine (2008).
biography.name: Bülent Sakrak

biography.bio: Soley Akça is an actress, known for Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012).
biography.name: Soley Akça

biography.bio: Öner Ates is an actor, known for Bornova Bornova (2009), Ögrenci Isleri (2015) and Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012).
biography.name: Öner Ates

biography.bio: Simge Fistikoglu is an actress, known for Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012), Extreme-G (2011) and Extreme-G: Skydiving (2014).
biography.name: Simge Fistikoglu
